name: enhanced-image-handler-service
description: Enhanced image handler service that generates thumbnails and evaluate image for metadata generation/analysis

scripts.build: yarn install; cd ./lambda/analyzer && yarn install; cd ../handler && yarn install; cd ../retriever && yarn install; cd ../thumbnailer && SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux sharp

author: Vinicius Silva <vinicius.ls@live.com>
